description: Roxanne is in a not so great area, and not paying attention to her surroundings. Before she knows what is happening, she is bound and being taken to a dark dungeon. She is put in a multitude of bondage potions, tormented and fucked to multiple orgasms. Next time this horny little slut will pay better attention to where she is and who is lurking in the dark.
title: Wrong Place at the Wrong Time
